data.title: Wedding location hire on Lake Constance
data.meta_description: Celebrate your wedding directly on the shores of Lake Constance in Lochau, Vorarlberg ✓Lake view ✓Exclusive ambiance ✓Catering – Plan your dream wedding on the lakeshore now!
data.text:
This day must be something very special and that’s what we are there for – for your dream wedding in one of the most beautiful locations on Lake Constance. Our Lochau wedding location in Vorarlberg offers an idyllic backdrop directly on Lake Constance on the lakeshore between Lindau and Bregenz.

Whether an intimate wedding celebration or a large-scale wedding party, exchanging your marriage vows in the Seehotel am Kaiserstrand offers the perfect start to the adventure of marriage. One of our experienced service team will look after every detail so that you can enjoy the most wonderful day of your life without a care in the world. Our event location also offers unforgettable photo motifs for your wedding on the lakeshore: For example a sunset just made for your big day. You can’t have more happiness than that…
